channel.title: Bring Me The Horizon - New Album - Sempiternal
channel.description:
http://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sempiternal_(album) My favorite songs in order - 1: Sleepwalking 2: House Of Wolves 3: Shadow Moses 4: Go To Hell, For Heaven's Sake
I really like it and feel Oliver found his voice, he isn't like he used to be like 04-07 but hes been trying different screams and I think this is a good fit for the band. He wasn't too emotional in this album though, was expecting more emotion like with "Blessed With a Curse".

item.title: Bring Me The Horizon - New Album - Sempiternal
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

Those are also my favorite songs. His voice sounds so much better in this album and I think that they’re going in a positive direction.

#thisissandpitturtle

Read full topic

item.title: Bring Me The Horizon - New Album - Sempiternal
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:3, topic:514185”][quote author=Soulcist link=topic=632435.msg4276913#msg4276913 date=1365050179]
I think the album is a lot better than his past ones in total, I love it and so far I like all the songs (so far).

Also, the reason he is doing different things with his screams is because he’s stressing out his voice a lot, and he has to sound like he is now (at least that’s what I’ve heard, don’t keep up with the band that much).
[/quote]
The only song I wasn’t fond of was antivist. Yeah about his stressing his voice thing, I saw on youtube comments that he like sipped on detergent to make his screams better before a concert, Not sure if its true.[/quote]
Artists who scream/growl, usually gargle salt water. That’s probably what that person meant because drinking detergent could kill you and or make your internal organs extremely hurt.

OP: I like their new album but, there could be a bit more screaming. I’d also like for them to go a big harder. They’ve gotten a lot lighter since their Count Your Blessings album. Maybe a notch down from that album would be nice.

Read full topic

item.title: Bring Me The Horizon - New Album - Sempiternal
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

en.m.wikipedia.org

Sempiternal (album)

Sempiternal is the fourth studio album by British rock band Bring Me the Horizon. It was released on 1 April 2013 worldwide through RCA, a subsidiary label of Sony Music Entertainment, and 2 April 2013 in the United States and Canada through Epitaph. It is the first album to feature former Worship keyboardist Jordan Fish and was believed to be the last album to feature guitarist Jona Weinhofen. However, Weinhofen's role within the album's development has been faced with controversy. Written and r...


My favorite songs in order -
1: Sleepwalking
2: House Of Wolves
3: Shadow Moses
4: Go To Hell, For Heaven’s Sake

I really like it and feel Oliver found his voice, he isn’t like he used to be like 04-07 but hes been trying different screams and I think this is a good fit for the band. He wasn’t too emotional in this album though, was expecting more emotion like with “Blessed With a Curse”.

Read full topic
